Function reference

All functions

add_errors_Hd()
Add Hp-errors to table
add_errors_Hp()
Add Hp-errors to table
add_errors_to_genotypes()
Add errors to genotypes
allele_probs_to_geno_probs()
Allele probabilities to genotype probabilities assuming Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium
calc_LRs()
Calculate LR for a profile
d_formulas_Hd
Enumeration of possibilities under Hd
d_formulas_Hp
Enumeration of possibilities under Hp
d_formulas_single
Enumeration of possibilities for single observation
d_prob_Hd
Formulas under Hd grouped by XD and XS
d_prob_Hp
Formulas under Hp grouped by XD and XS
d_prob_LR
Formulas for LR grouped by XD and XS
d_probtable_Hd
Probabilties for efficient sampling under Hd
d_probtable_Hp
Probabilties for efficient sampling under Hp
estimate_w()
Estimate error probability, w
estimate_w_bayesian()
Estimate error probability, w, using a Bayesian approach
estimate_w_se()
Estimate standard error of error probability, w
extract_profile()
Extract profile from ranked markers
extract_profile_v1()
Extract profile
get_ns()
Get counts from table
graph_Hd
Graph for enumeration of possibilities under Hd
graph_Hp
Graph for enumeration of possibilities under Hp
graph_single
Graph for enumeration of possibilities for single observation
marker_candidates_v1
Marker candidates (v1)
posterior_samples()
Extract posterior samples
reuse_genotype_probs()
Re-use genotype probabilities
sample_data_Hd()
Sample cases under Hd
sample_data_Hp()
Sample cases under Hp
sample_profiles_without_error()
Sample genotype without error
to012()
Convert to 0/1/2 notation
